verses.text: And David assembled all the princes of Israel , the princes of the tribes , and the captains of the companies that ministered to the king by course , and the captains over the thousands , and captains over the hundreds , and the stewards over all the substance and possession of the king , and of his sons , with the officers , and with the mighty men , and with all the valiant men , unto Jerusalem.\f + \fr 28.1 \ft possession: or, cattle\f*\f + \fr 28.1 \ft and of…: or, and his sons\f*\f + \fr 28.1 \ft officers: or, eunuchs\f*

Then David the king stood up upon his feet , and said , Hear me, my brethren , and my people : \add As for me\add*, I \add had\add* in mine heart to build an house of rest for the ark of the covenant of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and for the footstool of our God , and had made ready for the building :
But God said unto me, Thou shalt not build an house for my name , because thou \add hast been\add* a man of war , and hast shed blood.\f + \fr 28.3 \ft blood: Heb. bloods\f*

Howbeit the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of Israel chose me before all the house of my father to be king over Israel for ever : for he hath chosen Judah \add to be\add* the ruler ; and of the house of Judah , the house of my father ; and among the sons of my father he liked me to make \add me\add* king over all Israel :

And of all my sons , (for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath given me many sons ,) he hath chosen Solomon my son to sit upon the throne of the kingdom of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* over Israel.
And he said unto me, Solomon thy son , he shall build my house and my courts : for I have chosen him \add to be\add* my son , and I will be his father.
Moreover I will establish his kingdom for ever , if he be constant to do my commandments and my judgments , as at this day.\f + \fr 28.7 \ft constant: Heb. strong\f*

Now therefore in the sight of all Israel the congregation of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and in the audience of our God , keep and seek for all the commandments of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your God : that ye may possess this good land , and leave \add it\add* for an inheritance for your children after you for ever. \p

¶ And thou, Solomon my son , know thou the God of thy father , and serve him with a perfect heart and with a willing mind : for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* searcheth all hearts , and understandeth all the imaginations of the thoughts : if thou seek him, he will be found of thee; but if thou forsake him, he will cast thee off for ever.
Take heed now; for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath chosen thee to build an house for the sanctuary : be strong , and do \add it\add*. \p

¶ Then David gave to Solomon his son the pattern of the porch , and of the houses thereof, and of the treasuries thereof, and of the upper chambers thereof, and of the inner parlours thereof, and of the place of the mercy seat ,

And the pattern of all that he had by the spirit , of the courts of the house of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and of all the chambers round about , of the treasuries of the house of God , and of the treasuries of the dedicated things :\f + \fr 28.12 \ft of all that…: Heb. of all that was with him\f*

Also for the courses of the priests and the Levites , and for all the work of the service of the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and for all the vessels of service in the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

\add He gave\add* of gold by weight for \add things\add* of gold , for all instruments of all manner of service ; \add silver also\add* for all instruments of silver by weight , for all instruments of every kind of service :

Even the weight for the candlesticks of gold , and for their lamps of gold , by weight for every candlestick , and for the lamps thereof: and for the candlesticks of silver by weight , \add both\add* for the candlestick , and \add also\add* for the lamps thereof, according to the use of every candlestick.
And by weight \add he gave\add* gold for the tables of shewbread , for every table ; and \add likewise\add* silver for the tables of silver :

Also pure gold for the fleshhooks , and the bowls , and the cups : and for the golden basons \add he gave gold\add* by weight for every bason ; and \add likewise silver\add* by weight for every bason of silver :

And for the altar of incense refined gold by weight ; and gold for the pattern of the chariot of the cherubims , that spread out \add their wings\add*, and covered the ark of the covenant of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
All \add this, said David\add*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* made me understand in writing by \add his\add* hand upon me, \add even\add* all the works of this pattern.

And David said to Solomon his son , Be strong and of good courage , and do \add it:\add* fear not, nor be dismayed : for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* God , \add even\add* my God , \add will be\add* with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee, until thou hast finished all the work for the service of the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And, behold, the courses of the priests and the Levites , \add even they shall be with thee\add* for all the service of the house of God : and \add there shall be\add* with thee for all manner of workmanship every willing skilful man , for any manner of service : also the princes and all the people \add will be\add* wholly at thy commandment.
